description: This is a market on whether Magnus Carlsen or Teimour Radjabov will win their Semifinals Series of the FTX Crypto Cup, scheduled to take place over May 28, 2021 and May 29, 2021. The market will resolve to “Carlsen” if Magnus Carlsen wins the series, or “Radjabov” if Teimour Radjabov wins the series. If any games of the series are postponed to a day on or before June 1, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If any games of the series are postponed to a day after June 1, 2021, and the result cannot be determined from previously played games, then the market will resolve to 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
